Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class handles different tasks for application
    Author:
    Linus Forsberg

      private boolean writerThreadRunning 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Controller(GUIMutex gui)
      Constructor gets reference to GUI, creates instances of Writer, Reader and CharacterBuffer

      Start reader thread, boolean decides if buffer is synchronized or not
      void startWriterThread(boolean isSynchronized)
      Start writer thread, boolean decides if buffer is synchronized or not
      void updateGUIResults()
      Update GUI results if both reader-thread and writer-thread has finished Compares sent string with received string and passes boolean to GUI
      void writerThreadRunning(boolean running)
      Receives boolean when writer thread is finished
